meanings.definition: A frozen dessert made from fruit juice or puree, sugar, and water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing sorbet after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The sorbet melted quickly in the summer heat.
meanings.sent3: The sorbet was so cold, it made my teeth chatter!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and light as a sorbet.
meanings.sent5: The sorbet sparkled like a gem in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: I will sorbet the dessert first.
meanings.sent2: She sorbets her sorbet slowly to savor the flavor.
meanings.sent3: He sorbets the sorbet as if it's the last one on Earth!
meanings.sent4: Sorbetting the sorbet felt like a cool breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: Sorbetting the sorbet brought back memories of summer days.
